item.title: Visual Decoding and Reconstruction via EEG Embeddings with Guided Diffusion
item.description: Researchers developed a novel zero-shot EEG-based framework for visual reconstruction using a tailored brain encoder and a two-stage image generation strategy, achieving state-of-the-art performance i…
